Preprocess data prior to running machine learning

preprocess_data.Rd

Preprocess data prior to running machine learning

preprocess_data(
  dataset,
  outcome_colname,
  method = c("center", "scale"),
  rm_nzv = TRUE
)

Arguments

dataset

dataframe with an outcome variable and other columns as features
outcome_colname

column name as a string of the outcome variable
method

methods to preprocess the data, described in caret::preProcess (defaut: c("center","scale"), use NULL for no normalization)
rm_nzv

whether to remove variables with near-zero variance (default: TRUE)

Value

preprocessed data

Examples

preprocess_data(mikRopML::otu_small,'dx')
#> # A tibble: 60 x 61
